articles.title: Deadly winter storm bringing tornado threats and hazardous precipitation to millions from Gulf states to Canada - CNN
articles.description: A deadly storm system plowed across the United States on Thursday bringing tornado threats and dumping wintry precipitation and rain on Americans from the Gulf to Canada.

articles.title: Olympic women’s hockey Thursday recap: Canada, U.S. lose key forwards to injury - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: One day into the Olympic women's hockey tournament and the top two teams already are dealing with injury concerns. Canada lost veteran forward Melodie Daoust, while American forward Brianna Decker was carried off on a stretcher in another game.

articles.title: Gold price anchored at $1800 following 23K drop in U.S. Weekly Jobless Claims - Kitco NEWS
articles.description: (Kitco News) - The gold market remains anchored around $1,800 an ounce following stronger than expected labor market data as fewer American workers applied for initial unemployment benefits last week.
